title: Rooster Teeth
summary: Rooster Teeth Productions, LLC is an American video production company headquartered in Austin, Texas. Founded in 2003 by Burnie Burns, Matt Hullum, Geoff Ramsey, Jason Salda√±a, Gus Sorola, and Joel Heyman,[4] Rooster Teeth is a subsidiary of Otter Media, which is itself a subsidiary of WarnerMedia Sales and Distribution, a division of AT&T's WarnerMedia.
